REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2571 reute d f BC-ALLIED-SIGNAL-<ALD>-C 03-31 0057

TEXT.TITLE: ALLIED-SIGNAL <ALD> COMPLETES UNIT SALE
TEXT.BODY: Allied-Signal Inc said it completed the previously announced sale of its Linotype Group to Commerzbank AG of West Germany. The purchase price was not disclosed. Eschborn, West Germany-based Linotype had 1986 sales of more than 200 mln dlrs, the company said. Reuter
